title: Coral and Emerald Starburst Pendant - Shobha Chandrika
materials: SI Clarity). Hyderabadi Kundan Setting. Gold backing.
features: A contemporary take on traditional Kundan setting, featuring a starburst design. Round emeralds are meticulously set around a central cabochon coral. The entire design is outlined with shimmering Polki diamonds. The back features a smooth, polished gold finish. This design blends classical aesthetics with a modern silhouette.
occasions: and festive occasions. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to contemporary attire. It would also be perfect for engagement parties.
description: This pendant is a stunning fusion of traditional Kundan artistry and modern design sensibilities. The use of high-quality natural emeralds and coral, combined with the brilliance of Polki diamonds, ensures lasting beauty and value. The 'Shobha Chandrika' design is a testament to the exquisite craftsmanship that our Hyderabad store is renowned for. It’s a statement piece that exudes sophistication and cultural pride.
